title: What do you mean by hibernation? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Hibernation” is a kind of sleep that some animals (like bears and insects) practice when the weather gets too cold. That is why they eat a lot of food, so the energy gained from the food will be used for the winter.

Many animal hibernate in winter when food is not available or estivate in the driest seasons when water is not available. The animals go into a low metabolic rate sleep where the energy use is reduced, body temperature floats above freezing and they can survive on the fat they have stored for their long sleep. Most hibernators periodically wake up to defecate or urinate and then return to the lower body temperature of hibernation.
